derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek koris 'bug' + opsis 'appearance' (because of the shape of the seed)

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous plants of the genus Coreopsis having a profusion of showy usually yellow daisylike flowers over long periods; North and South America
